name: watze-jwt-parser
title: WatzeTools JWT Parser
description: Parses JWT tokens and displays them easily. Also verifies the signature of the token (optional).
author: watzenare

commands.name: jwt
commands.title: WatzeTools JWT Parser
commands.subtitle: WatzeTools JWT
commands.description: Parse, verify and decode JWT tokens

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
